executable.title: Enhance Image Using Discriminant Analysis (TubeTK)
executable.description: Given multiple, registered images and foreground and background masks, computes a multivariate LDA or PCA for separating the classes, and generates the LDA/PCA instances of the images.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.
